examples: How can I join Exercise Daily?
responses: Our membership includes certification, AI training, short video creation, and media features. Learn more: https://exercisedaily.com/membership/

examples: How do I apply for a scholarship?
Is there a free scholarship program?
responses: Yes! Visit https://exercisedaily.com/scholarships/ to apply for a fully-sponsored membership.

examples: Tell me about the Media Lab training.
responses: Our AI-powered Media Lab trains individuals in short video creation, digital marketing, and production workflows. See https://exercisedaily.com/curriculum-design/ for details.
You can get featured in our magazine and social platforms. Apply here: https://exercisedaily.com/get-featured-in-magazine/
